title: Global Collaboration Driving Innovation in a Multi-Billion Dollar Market
description:
Innovium enables its breakthrough FLASHLIGHT™ Telemetry on SONiC based systems. FLASHLIGHT is a comprehensive telemetry and analytics solution addressing the emerging challenges faced by network operators in keeping their modern, terabit-scale data center networks operating at peak performance. Detecting and troubleshooting anomalous network behavior require deep, high-frequency network telemetry & hardware driven analytics to extract meaningful and actionable insights from otherwise voluminous telemetry data. FLASHLIGHT provides an unmatched solution to help resolve the underlying root causes of impairments such as sluggish network performance or slow application response caused by previously undetectable events such as short-lived microbursts.

Innovium will showcase FLASHLIGHT, a just-in-time solution for Telco/Edge networks running SONiC.
attendees_expected_learnt: Innovium will showcase how FLASHLIGHT Telemetry is a just-in-time solution for Telco/Edge network operators running SONiC, addresses the above challenging scenarios, get insights and implement meaningful traffic engineering to troubleshoot and boost network performance.
